name: Campfire Legends: The Last Act
storyline: Reggie and Ashley are on their way to surprise the campfire girls when an accident strands them deep in the middle of nowhere. When Reggie wakes up from the blackout, she realizes Ashley is gone and the only sign of life is a small light emanating from a mysterious mansion. Will she find Ashley? Or a ghost from her past?
summary: Reggie and Ashley are on their way to surprise the campfire girls when an accident strands them deep in the middle of nowhere. When Reggie wakes up from the blackout, she realizes Ashley is gone and the only sign of life is a small light emanating from a mysterious mansion.
